data.title: Tribute for Jerry Sean Hughes
data.meta_description: Tribute for Jerry Sean Hughes | Sean “Dawg” Hughes went to be with our Lord and Savior on October 28th, 2023. He was with his son James, and his wife Joy in his final hours. Sean was born in Murphy, NC on May 15th, 1967, to...
data.meta_site_name: Tribute for Jerry Sean Hughes | Dakan Funeral Chapel
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
